REST API routes Auth¶

async api.auth.confirmed_email(token: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Async function for confirmed email. Takes in user credentials and database session as parameters.

Parameters:

  • token – str

  • db – Session

Returns:

json with success message

async api.auth.login(body: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(OAuth2PasswordRequestForm), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Async function for user login. Takes in user credentials and database session as parameters.

Parameters:

  • body – OAuth2PasswordRequestForm

  • db – Session

Returns:

returns access token and refresh token

async api.auth.refresh_token(credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Security(HTTPBearer), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Async function for user refresh token. Takes in user credentials and database session as parameters.

Parameters:

  • credentials – HTTPAuthorizationCredentials

  • db – Session

Returns:

returns access token and refresh token

async api.auth.request_email(body: RequestEmail, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, request: Request, db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Async function for request email. Takes in user credentials and database session as parameters.

Parameters:

  • body – RequestEmail

  • background_tasks – BackgroundTasks

  • request – Request

  • db – Session

Returns:

json with success message

async api.auth.signup(body: UserBase, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, request: Request, db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Async function for user registration. Takes in user data and database session as parameters.

Parameters:

  • body – UserBase

  • background_tasks – BackgroundTasks

  • request – Request

  • db – Session

Returns:

returns success message

async api.auth.upload_userpic(file: UploadFile = File(PydanticUndefined), uploader=Depends(upload), current_user=Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Async function for upload userpic. Takes in user credentials and database session as parameters.

Parameters:

  • file – UploadFile

  • uploader – Depends(upload)

  • current_user – Depends(get_current_user)

  • db – Session

Returns:

json with success message

REST API MODELS¶

class models.contacts.ContactDB(**kwargs)¶

Bases: Base

SQLAlchemy model for contacts table inherits from Base class from sqlalchemy

Has one-to-many relationship with User

Parameters:

  • id – (integer) primary key

  • firstname – (string) first name

  • lastname – (string) last name

  • email – (string) email

  • phone – (string) phone number

  • birthdate – (date) birthdate

  • user_id – (integer) foreign key to users table

  • user – one-to-many relationship with User

birthdate¶
email¶
firstname¶
id¶
lastname¶
phone¶
user¶
user_id¶
class models.contacts.User(**kwargs)¶

Bases: Base

SQLAlchemy model for users table inherits from Base class from sqlalchemy

Has one-to-many relationship with ContactDB

Parameters:

  • id – (integer) primary key

  • email – (string) email

  • password – (string) password

  • refresh_token – (string) refresh token

  • confirmed – (boolean) user confirmed or not

  • userpic – (string) user picture

  • contacts – one-to-many relationship with ContactDB

REST API services Auth¶

class services.auth.Auth¶

Bases: object

A class for auth services

Parameters:

  • pwd_context – (CryptContext) context for password hashing

  • SECRET_KEY – (str) secret key for jwt token signing and verification

  • ALGORITHM – (str) cyphering algorithm for jwt token generation

  • oauth2_scheme – (OAuth2PasswordBearer) custom oauth2 scheme

ALGORITHM = 'HS256'¶
SECRET_KEY = 'a37a1f748ee8ccf83878a3cec2bea9fa96d025e20fdeb613'¶

a method for creating access token

  • data – (dict) data to encode

  • expires_delta – (int) expiration time in seconds

Returns:

(str) encoded access token

a method for creating email token

data – (dict) data to encode

Returns:

(str) encoded email token

a method for creating refresh token

Parameters:

  • data – (dict) data to encode

  • expires_delta – (int) expiration time in seconds

Returns:

(str) encoded refresh token

async decode_refresh_token(refresh_token: str)¶

a method for decoding refresh token

Parameters:

refresh_token – (str) refresh token

Returns:

(str) email of the user

Raise:

HTTPException with status code 401 if token is invalid or expired

a method for getting current user

Parameters:

  • token – (str) access token

  • db – (Session) database session

Returns:

(User) current user

Raise:

HTTPException with status code 401 if token is invalid or expired
